body_html: Hm. So the logger is already configured to make a StreamHandler which should by default point to stderr (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/tf_logging.py#L46). Does jupyter discard stderr? Do we have to log to stdout for it to show up?
body_text: Hm. So the logger is already configured to make a StreamHandler which should by default point to stderr (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/tf_logging.py#L46). Does jupyter discard stderr? Do we have to log to stdout for it to show up?
body: Hm. So the logger is already configured to make a StreamHandler which should by default point to stderr (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/platform/tf_logging.py#L46). Does jupyter discard stderr? Do we have to log to stdout for it to show up?
